# The `OptLevelChanger` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel">SelectionDAGISel</a> to temporarily override the optimization level on a per-function basis. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class is used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel">SelectionDAGISel</a> to temporarily override the optimization level on a per-function basis.
